mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, DDL_IDX_ID, DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_IDX_LNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, DB_SCH_ID, DB_SCH_PNM, DDL_TBL_ID, DDL_TBL_PNM, IDX_SPAC_ID, IDX_SPAC_PNM, PK_IDX_YN, UK_IDX_YN, IDX_TYP_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_ASM

A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.DDL_IDX_ID, A.DDL_IDX_PNM, A.DDL_IDX_LNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, A.DB_SCH_ID, A.DB_SCH_PNM, A.DDL_TBL_ID, A.DDL_TBL_PNM, A.IDX_SPAC_ID, A.IDX_SPAC_PNM, A.PK_IDX_YN, A.UK_IDX_YN, A.IDX_TYP_CD, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.DDL_IDX_COL_ASM
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_DDL_IDX (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, DDL_IDX_ID, DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_IDX_LNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, DB_SCH_ID, DB_SCH_PNM, DDL_TBL_ID, DDL_TBL_PNM, IDX_SPAC_ID, IDX_SPAC_PNM, PK_IDX_YN, UK_IDX_YN, IDX_TYP_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, SCRT_INFO ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlIdxLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idxSpacId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idxSpacPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ukIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idxTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scrtInfo,jdbcType=CLOB} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO),0) + 1 AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
insert into WAQ_DDL_IDX
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO,
DDL_IDX_ID,
DDL_IDX_PNM,
DDL_IDX_LNM,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
DB_CONN_TRG_ID,
DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
DB_SCH_ID,
DB_SCH_PNM,
DDL_TBL_ID,
DDL_TBL_PNM,
IDX_SPAC_ID,
IDX_SPAC_PNM,
PK_IDX_YN,
UK_IDX_YN,
IDX_TYP_CD,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
SCRT_INFO,
DDL_IDX_COL_ASM,
SRC_DDL_TRG_DCD,
SRC_DB_SCH_ID,
SRC_DB_SCH_PNM,
SRC_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
TGT_DDL_TRG_DCD,
TGT_DB_SCH_ID,
TGT_DB_SCH_PNM,
TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIM(UPPER(#{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
#{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{idxSpacId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{idxSpacPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pkIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ukIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{idxTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1 ,
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATETIME, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATETIME,
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scrtInfo,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{ddlIdxColAsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDdlTrgDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDdlTrgDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_DDL_IDX
DDL_IDX_ID = #{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_IDX_PNM = TRIM(UPPER(#{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
DDL_IDX_LNM = #{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = #{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_SCH_PNM = #{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_TBL_ID = #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_TBL_PNM = #{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDX_SPAC_ID = #{idxSpacId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDX_SPAC_PNM = #{idxSpacPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_IDX_YN = #{pkIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UK_IDX_YN = #{ukIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDX_TYP_CD = #{idxTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCRT_INFO = #{scrtInfo,jdbcType=CLOB},
DDL_IDX_COL_ASM = #{ddlIdxColAsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_DDL_IDX set DDL_IDX_ID = #{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_PNM = #{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_LNM = #{ddlIdxLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = #{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_SCH_PNM = #{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_TBL_ID = #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_TBL_PNM = #{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDX_SPAC_ID = #{idxSpacId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDX_SPAC_PNM = #{idxSpacPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_IDX_YN = #{pkIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UK_IDX_YN = #{ukIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDX_TYP_CD = #{idxTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCRT_INFO = #{scrtInfo,jdbcType=CLOB} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_DDL_IDX set DDL_IDX_ID = #{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_PNM = #{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_LNM = #{ddlIdxLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = #{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_SCH_PNM = #{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_TBL_ID = #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_TBL_PNM = #{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDX_SPAC_ID = #{idxSpacId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDX_SPAC_PNM = #{idxSpacPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_IDX_YN = #{pkIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UK_IDX_YN = #{ukIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDX_TYP_CD = #{idxTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
--DDL 인덱스 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
--, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS RQST_USER_NM , B.DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A LEFT JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID AND B.DDL_TRG_DCD = 'D' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복(DDX01) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND A.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO )

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 인덱스 미존재(DDX02) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_IDX D WHERE A.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND A.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 인덱스 (DDX03) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND A.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 DDL테이블 (DDX13) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL E INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR F ON F.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' WHERE E.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID AND NVL(E.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )
--검증쿼리 : DB접속정보 미존재(DDX04) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID IS NULL
--검증쿼리 : DB스키마 미존재(DDX05) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DB_SCH_ID IS NULL
--검증쿼리 : DDL테이블 미존재(DDX06) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DDL_TBL_ID IS NULL
--검증쿼리 : 인덱스스페이스 미존재(DDX07) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.IDX_SPAC_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 컬럼 존재여부 체크(DDX08)
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO )

--검증쿼리 : 인덱스 명명규칙 위반 (DDX09) --
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL B LEFT JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON C.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE B.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM||'_IXZZ' = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.DDL_IDX_PNM,'[_,0-9]+$','ZZ') )

--검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (DDX00) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_IDX D WHERE A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND NVL(A.UK_IDX_YN, 'N') = NVL(D.UK_IDX_YN, 'N') ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '1' )

--검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (DDX00) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_IDX D WHERE A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND NVL(A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, '_') = NVL(D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, '_') AND NVL(A.DB_SCH_ID, '_') = NVL(D.DB_SCH_ID, '_') AND NVL(A.DDL_TBL_ID, '_') = NVL(D.DDL_TBL_ID, '_') AND NVL(A.IDX_SPAC_ID, '_') = NVL(D.IDX_SPAC_ID, '_') AND NVL(A.UK_IDX_YN, 'N') = NVL(D.UK_IDX_YN, 'N')
) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '1' )

--검증쿼리 : 컬럼 오류가 있을 경우 체크 (DDX99) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = D.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '2'
)
mapper.update: --요청구분 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX A SET (A.REG_TYP_CD, A.DDL_IDX_ID) = ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.DDL_IDX_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.DDL_IDX_ID) AS DDL_IDX_ID FROM WAM_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON S.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_IDX_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_PNM ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

-- 각종 ID 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX A SET (A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, A.DB_SCH_ID, A.DDL_TBL_ID, A.IDX_SPAC_ID, A.IDX_SPAC_PNM ) = ( SELECT MAX(D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID), MAX(C.DB_SCH_ID), MAX(B.DDL_TBL_ID) , MAX(E.DB_TBL_SPAC_ID) , MAX(E.DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM) FROM WAM_DDL_TBL B INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_TBL_SPAC E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.DB_TBL_SPAC_ID = C.DB_IDX_SPAC_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AND C.DB_SCH_PNM = A.DB_SCH_PNM AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL B INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_TBL_SPAC E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.DB_TBL_SPAC_ID = C.DB_IDX_SPAC_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AND C.DB_SCH_PNM = A.DB_SCH_PNM AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM )
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT * FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX A SET (DDL_IDX_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.DDL_IDX_ID AS DDL_IDX_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON B.DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DDL_IDX_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_PNM AND C.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM AND S.DB_SCH_PNM = A.DB_SCH_PNM AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON B.DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DDL_IDX_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_PNM AND C.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM AND S.DB_SCH_PNM = A.DB_SCH_PNM AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM )

--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX A SET (DDL_TBL_ID) = (SELECT B.DDL_TBL_ID FROM WAM_DDL_TBL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.DDL_TBL_ID IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND ROWNUM = 1 )
mapper.sql: , DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_IDX_LNM, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_SCH_ID, DDL_TBL_ID , IDX_SPAC_ID , PK_IDX_YN, UK_IDX_YN, IDX_TYP_CD, SCRT_INFO , PRC_TYP_CD , PRC_DT , PRC_DBA_ID , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_ASM , SRC_DDL_TRG_DCD , SRC_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , SRC_DB_SCH_PNM , SRC_DB_SCH_ID , TGT_DDL_TRG_DCD , TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , TGT_DB_SCH_PNM , TGT_DB_SCH_ID

, DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_IDX_LNM, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_SCH_ID, DDL_TBL_ID , IDX_SPAC_ID , PK_IDX_YN, UK_IDX_YN, IDX_TYP_CD, SCRT_INFO, NULL AS PRC_TYP_CD, NULL AS PRC_DT, NULL AS PRC_DBA_ID , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_ASM , SRC_DDL_TRG_DCD , SRC_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , SRC_DB_SCH_PNM , SRC_DB_SCH_ID , TGT_DDL_TRG_DCD , TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , TGT_DB_SCH_PNM , TGT_DB_SCH_ID
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_DDL_IDX A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DDL_IDX_ID = A.DDL_IDX_ID )
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_DDL_IDX A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DDL_IDX_ID = A.DDL_IDX_ID )
mapper.insert: --DDL 테이블 추가시 물리모델 컬럼을 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_IDX_LNM , RQST_DCD , DB_CONN_TRG_ID , DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , DB_SCH_ID , DB_SCH_PNM , DDL_TBL_ID , DDL_TBL_PNM , IDX_SPAC_ID , IDX_SPAC_PNM , PK_IDX_YN , UK_IDX_YN , IDX_TYP_CD , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(X.RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.DDL_IDX_ID , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , 'CU' AS RQST_DCD , C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , E.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , A.DB_SCH_ID , F.DB_SCH_PNM , B.DDL_TBL_ID , A.DDL_TBL_PNM , C.IDX_SPAC_ID , D.DB_TBL_SPAC_LNM , C.PK_IDX_YN , C.UK_IDX_YN , C.IDX_TYP_CD , C.OBJ_DESCN , C.OBJ_VERS , C.FRS_RQST_DTM , C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_TBL_SPAC D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.DB_TBL_SPAC_ID = C.IDX_SPAC_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_SCH F ON F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND F.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

--DDL 테이블 추가시 물리모델 컬럼을 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_IDX_LNM , RQST_DCD , DB_CONN_TRG_ID , DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , DB_SCH_ID , DB_SCH_PNM , DDL_TBL_ID , DDL_TBL_PNM , PK_IDX_YN , UK_IDX_YN , IDX_TYP_CD , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_ASM ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX X WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , C.DDL_IDX_LNM , A.RQST_DCD , F.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID , F.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , A.DB_SCH_ID , E.DB_SCH_PNM AS DB_SCH_PNM , A.DDL_TBL_ID , A.DDL_TBL_PNM , NVL(C.PK_IDX_YN,'N') AS PK_IDX_YN , NVL(C.UK_IDX_YN,'N') AS UK_IDX_YN , C.IDX_TYP_CD , C.OBJ_DESCN , C.OBJ_VERS , C.FRS_RQST_DTM , C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , SYSDATETIME , C.RQST_USER_ID , C.DDL_IDX_COL_ASM FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B --소스테이블 ON B.DB_SCH_ID = A.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C --소스인덱스 ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH E --타겟 스키마 ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG F --타겟DB ON F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND F.DB_CONN_TRG_ID =E.DB_CONN_TRG_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
insert into WAQ_DDL_IDX
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO,
DDL_IDX_ID,
DDL_IDX_PNM,
DDL_IDX_LNM,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
DB_CONN_TRG_ID,
DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
DB_SCH_ID,
DB_SCH_PNM,
DDL_TBL_ID,
DDL_TBL_PNM,
IDX_SPAC_ID,
IDX_SPAC_PNM,
UK_IDX_YN,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
SCRT_INFO,
DDL_TRG_DCD,
SRC_DDL_TRG_DCD,
SRC_DB_SCH_ID,
SRC_DB_SCH_PNM,
SRC_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
TGT_DDL_TRG_DCD,
TGT_DB_SCH_ID,
TGT_DB_SCH_PNM,
TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{idxSpacId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{idxSpacPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ukIdxYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1 ,
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATETIME, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATETIME,
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scrtInfo,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{ddlTrgDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDdlTrgDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcDbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDdlTrgDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT 'IDX' AS OBJ_DCD , C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , C.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , A.DB_SCH_ID , B.DB_SCH_PNM , A.DDL_IDX_ID , D.DDL_TBL_PNM , D.DDL_TBL_LNM , A.DDL_IDX_PNM , A.DDL_IDX_LNM , A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAM_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH B ON B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL D ON D.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DB_SCH_ID = #{srcDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (D.DDL_TBL_PNM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR '%' || D.DDL_TBL_LNM LIKE UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR A.DDL_IDX_PNM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR '%' || A.DDL_IDX_LNM LIKE UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')

SELECT 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , '' AS DDL_TBL_ID , 'IDX' AS OBJ_DCD , #{reqmst.tgtDbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , E.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID , #{reqmst.tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS DB_SCH_ID , #{reqmst.tgtDbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS DB_SCH_PNM , T.DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_TBL_PNM , T.DDL_TBL_LNM AS DDL_TBL_LNM , A.DDL_IDX_PNM AS DDL_IDX_PNM , A.DDL_IDX_LNM AS DDL_IDX_LNM , A.UK_IDX_YN AS UK_IDX_YN , D.DDL_TRG_DCD AS DDL_TRG_DCD , #{reqmst.rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS RQST_DCD , A.OBJ_DESCN , B.DDL_TRG_DCD AS SRC_DDL_TRG_DCD , B.DB_SCH_ID AS SRC_DB_SCH_ID , B.DB_SCH_PNM AS SRC_DB_SCH_PNM , C.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS SRC_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , D.DDL_TRG_DCD AS TGT_DDL_TRG_DCD , D.DB_SCH_ID AS TGT_DB_SCH_ID , D.DB_SCH_PNM AS TGT_DB_SCH_PNM , E.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM FROM WAM_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL T ON T.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH B ON B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.DB_SCH_ID = #{reqmst.tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID WHERE A.DDL_IDX_ID IN
#{item.ddlIdxId}

--DDL 인덱스이관 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
--, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS RQST_USER_NM , C.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS SRC_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , B.DB_SCH_PNM AS SRC_DB_SCH_PNM , E.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , D.DB_SCH_PNM AS TGT_DB_SCH_PNM , 'IDX' AS OBJ_DCD FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_SCH B ON B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.DB_SCH_ID = A.SRC_DB_SCH_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_SCH D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.DB_SCH_ID = A.TGT_DB_SCH_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX A SET RQST_DCD = 'DD' , REG_TYP_CD = 'D' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X WHERE X.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_COL Y WHERE Y.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND Y.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND Y.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND Y.DDL_COL_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM ) )

UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX A SET (A.IDX_SPAC_ID, A.IDX_SPAC_PNM) = ( SELECT X.DB_IDX_SPAC_ID , Y.DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH X LEFT JOIN WAA_TBL_SPAC Y ON Y.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND Y.DB_TBL_SPAC_ID = X.DB_IDX_SPAC_ID WHERE X.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND X.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND X.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DB_SCH X LEFT JOIN WAA_TBL_SPAC Y ON Y.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND Y.DB_TBL_SPAC_ID = X.DB_IDX_SPAC_ID WHERE X.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND X.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND X.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 )
mapper.insert: --DDL에 존재하고 PDM에 없는 컬럼을 삭제대상으로 추가한다.... INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM , DDL_IDX_LNM , DB_SCH_ID , DDL_TBL_ID , UK_IDX_YN , IDX_TYP_CD , DDL_IDX_COL_ASM , RQST_DCD , REG_TYP_CD , VRF_CD , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO , B.RQST_SNO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(X.RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO ) + 1 AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.DDL_IDX_ID , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , C.DDL_IDX_LNM , C.DB_SCH_ID , C.DDL_TBL_ID , C.UK_IDX_YN , C.IDX_TYP_CD , C.DDL_IDX_COL_ASM , 'DD' AS RQST_DCD , 'D' AS REG_TYP_CD , '4' AS VRF_CD , C.OBJ_DESCN , C.OBJ_VERS , C.FRS_RQST_DTM , C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , C.RQST_DTM , C.RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX X WHERE B.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND C.DDL_IDX_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_PNM )
mapper.select:
SELECT 'DD' AS RQST_DCD , 'IDX' AS OBJ_DCD , C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , C.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , A.DB_SCH_ID , B.DB_SCH_PNM , A.DDL_IDX_ID , D.DDL_TBL_PNM , D.DDL_TBL_LNM , A.DDL_IDX_PNM , A.DDL_IDX_LNM , A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAM_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH B ON B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL D ON D.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_IDX X WHERE X.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = #{srcDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = #{tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.DDL_IDX_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_PNM ) AND A.DB_SCH_ID = #{tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (D.DDL_TBL_PNM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR '%' || D.DDL_TBL_LNM LIKE UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR A.DDL_IDX_PNM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR '%' || A.DDL_IDX_LNM LIKE UPPER(#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
